description: This comprehensive online travel platform is designed to simplify booking and managing travel plans. Users can easily search for and book flights, hotels, rental cars, and even bus and train tickets, ensuring a wide range of travel options. Additionally, the platform offers curated holiday packages, providing a one-stop solution for all travel needs. Key features include itinerary management to keep track of travel details, personalized travel recommendations to enhance the journey and user reviews for informed decision-making. The app aims to deliver a seamless and cost-effective travel planning experience, catering to every aspect of a user's trip.

Traveler.description: The Traveler uses the platform to plan, book, and manage their travel itineraries, including flights, accommodations, and transportation.

OnboardingFlow.description: Provide travellers an overview of the app features, such as easy flight and hotel bookings, holiday packages, bus and train ticket reservations and user reviews, ensuring a seamless travel planning experience.

HolidayHome.description: The holiday home screen features discounts and offers on holiday packages. It includes various categories of holiday packages for travelers to choose from
HolidayHome.sections:
BestSellingDestinations: A carousel of cards showcasing the best selling domestic destinations. Each card includes image and 'Explore' button, which on click would navigate to Holiday list view.
              InternationDestinations: A carousel of cards showcasing the best selling international destinations. Each card includes Image and 'Explore' button, which on click on would navigate to holiday list view.
              HolidayThemes: A carousel of cards showcasing variety of holiday themes such as Premium, Adventurous, Honeymoon, Pilgrimage, Wildlife, Family, Solo etc. Each card includes Image, title and 'View more' button, which on click would navigate to holiday list view.

HolidayList.description: Displays detailed information about a specific holiday package, including itinerary, accommodation details, and booking options.
HolidayList.sections:
1. PackageOverview: A summary of the holiday package including title, duration, price, and a brief description.
      2. Itinerary: Detailed day-by-day itinerary of the holiday package, including activities, sightseeing, and meal plans.
      3. Accommodation: Information about the accommodations provided during the holiday, including hotel names, images, and descriptions.
      4. Inclusions: A list of inclusions such as flights, meals, transfers, and sightseeing.
      5. Exclusions: A list of exclusions such as personal expenses, travel insurance, and additional activities.
      6. BookingOptions: Options for booking the holiday package, including available dates, number of travelers, and a 'Book Now' button.
      7. CustomerReviews: A section displaying customer reviews and ratings for the holiday package.

Admin.description: The Admin oversees the entire platform, managing user accounts, monitoring transactions, and ensuring regulatory compliance.

OnboardingFlow.description: Guides new admins through setting up their account and managing listings, user roles, and analytics.

LandingPage.description: The first page that displays to admins, showcasing an overview of administrative features and tools.
LandingPage.sections: 1. HeroSection: Contains a summary of admin capabilities with some images and a 'Get Started' button. Clicking the button navigates to the Welcome Screen.

WelcomeScreen.description: Introduces the platform's admin features to new admins with a welcoming image and text.
WelcomeScreen.sections: 1. IntroSection: This section contains a welcome message and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Profile Setup Screen.

ProfileSetupScreen.description: Allows admins to set up their profile information including name, role, and contact details.
ProfileSetupScreen.sections: 1. ProfileForm: This section includes fields for entering profile details such as name, role, shift, ID number, etc., and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Listings Management Setup Screen.

ListingsManagementSetupScreen.description: Guides admins through the initial setup of listings management including property details, availability, and pricing.
ListingsManagementSetupScreen.sections: 1. ListingsForm: This section includes forms and fields for setting up property listings, including property details, availability dates, pricing information, and a 'Next' button that navigates to the User Management Setup Screen.

UserManagementSetupScreen.description: Allows admins to configure user roles and permissions, manage user accounts, and oversee user activities.
UserManagementSetupScreen.sections: 1. UserRoles: This section includes options for setting up different user roles and access levels, managing user accounts, and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Booking Management Setup Screen.

BookingManagementSetupScreen.description: Guides admins through the setup of booking management tools to handle reservations, cancellations, and customer inquiries.
BookingManagementSetupScreen.sections: 1. BookingSettings: This section includes options for configuring booking settings such as reservation rules, cancellation policies, customer inquiry management, and a 'Next' button that navigates to the Analytics Setup Screen.

AnalyticsSetupScreen.description: Guides admins through the setup of analytics and reporting tools to monitor performance and user engagement.
AnalyticsSetupScreen.sections: 1. AnalyticsConfig: This section includes options for selecting key performance indicators (KPIs), setting up reports, and a 'Finish' button that completes the onboarding process.

LoginScreen.description: Allows admins to create a new account or log in to an existing one.
LoginScreen.sections: 1. LoginFields: This section contains fields for email and password with a 'Login' button.

                  Alerts: Display a list of system alerts and issues requiring admin attention.
